OUTLINE : This randomize , double blind , multicenter study . Patients stratify center chemotherapy agent ( cisplatin v carboplatin v doxorubicin ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive standard educational material . Arm II : Patients receive specific intervention material addition standard educational material . Patients complete patient information questionnaire . Patients receive ondansetron orally IV 10-15 minute addition first 2 course chemotherapy . Patients complete nausea emesis questionnaire first 2 chemotherapy treatment . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 300 patient ( 150 per treatment arm ) accrue study .
